resources.string:
Studies show that eating
a proper breakfast is one of
the most positive things you can do
if you are trying to lose
weight."
Try to divide up your dosing times as evenly as possible throughout the day:

It is virtually impossible for anyone to remember to take each and every medication dose properly. Missing an occasional dose is probably less of a concern than frequently missing doses or taking incorrect doses
Drugs are large chemical structures that can be sensitive to the conditions in the stomach. For example, didanosine is destroyed by stomach acid
Taking your medications at the proper intervals
Absorb the proper amount of medication.
